text: Hi all, Can any one help me how to remove "powered by " tag on custom right side CRM card? attached image for your reference.
Sure - I resolved it after splitting it into multiple cards instead of one large card, but I can share the code with you in a DM :+1:

Hi Prasad, Immediate answer to this is, it's not possible today.

We have received this feedback once before and we are considering what other options we can add so that end users (sale or service reps) know who built this extensions and how to get support.

Can you tell me how that happens in ARC documents today? How do users reach out to you or your team, when an extension fails to load?
